pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: $(bold)TYPE:$() $(l:mechanics/spells_types)Self Use$() $(br)$(bold)COST: $(spell) + $(#935045)Netherite Ingot$()$(br)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)1$() $(br)$(bold)XP COST:$() $(#green)18$() $(br2)$(italic)''An easy spell to make and use with a vital feature : when striking an entity, it will give you the 'Steadfast' potion effect. Never miss a spell cast again!''$()

When casting $(#94835d)$(bold)Steadfast$(), a holy projectile will be thrown from your scroll. Upon striking another entity, $(#94835d)$(bold)Steadfast$() will grant you the the effect of the same name. $(br2)While under this effect, your spells will always be cast without failure for the whole duration of the potion effect. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
